name: Common Gauntlets
ability: When attaching, roll a die. If more than 3, add 1 to this armor's attack value

name: Leather Boots
ability: Increase attack speed by 1 when wearing these

name: Rusty Helmet
ability: Increase your overall attack by 2 each turn

name: Stone Tip Spear
ability: Increase attack speed by 2 when holding this

name: Wicker Shield
ability: Increase attack speed by 2 when holding this

name: Short Sword
ability: When attaching roll a die, if more than 3, add 1 to this weapon's attack value

name: Common Spellbook
ability: Once each turn, you may heal your warrior 5 HP.

name: Standard Bow
ability: Each turn roll a die.  If more than 4, this ability does 1 damage to the enemy.

name: Oak Staff
ability: After an attack with this staff is complete, reduce the enemy's total defense by 2.

name: Stone Hammer
ability: If enemy is using a shield, reduce sheild defense by 5

name: Light Sandals
ability: When an enemy attacks, roll a die. If 6 evade the incoming attack.

name: Sorcerer's Robes
ability: Receive an extra 50 gold if an opponent is defeated while wearing these.
